languages.text: "В этом и заключается глупость мон-кай. Как скот визжите от боли, что несут наши клинки, когда следует трепетать от ужасов, сокрытых за взором тебе подобных".
"That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the gaze of those such as you."
languages.original_text: "В этом и заключается глупость мон-кай. Как скот визжите от боли, что несут наши клинки, когда следует трепетать от ужасов, сокрытых за взором тебе подобных".

traits.locale_text: "That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the thoughts of your own kind."
"That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the thoughts of your own kind."
"That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the thoughts of your own kind."
"That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the thoughts of your own kind."

languages.text: “这正是猴子的愚蠢之处。他们在我们的刀刃下发出牲口般的嚎叫，但他们该害怕的并不是刀下的痛苦，而是像你这种人目光中隐含的恐怖。”
languages.original_text: "That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the gaze of those such as you."

traits.locale_text: “这正是猴子的愚蠢之处。他们在我们的刀刃下发出牲口般的嚎叫，但他们该害怕的并不是刀下的痛苦，而是像你这种人目光中隐含的恐怖。”

languages.text: « C'est là que les mon-keigh se trompent sur toute la ligne. Vous couinez comme du bétail à la vue de nos lames, alors que vous devriez plutôt craindre les horreurs cachées dans le regard de vos semblables. »
languages.original_text: "That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the gaze of those such as you."

traits.locale_text: « C'est là que les mon-keigh se trompent sur toute la ligne. Vous couinez comme du bétail à la vue de nos lames, alors que vous devriez plutôt craindre les horreurs cachées dans le regard de vos semblables. »

languages.text: "Das ist die Narretei der Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr quiekt durch den Schmerz, den unsere Klingen Euch zufügen, wie Vieh. Dabei solltet Ihr eigentlich vor den Schrecken in den Blicken von Euresgleichen erzittern."
languages.original_text: "That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the gaze of those such as you."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist die Narretei der Chem-Pan-Sey. Ihr quiekt durch den Schmerz, den unsere Klingen Euch zufügen, wie Vieh. Dabei solltet Ihr eigentlich vor dem Grauen erzittern, das in den Gedanken Eurer eigenen Spezies verborgen liegt."

languages.text: 「これはモン＝ケイの愚行だな。お前たちのようなものの眼差しに隠された恐怖に震えながら、お前は俺の刃が与える痛みに鳴く家畜のように鳴き声を上げるだろう」
languages.original_text: "That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the gaze of those such as you."

traits.locale_text: 「これはモン＝ケイの愚行だな。お前たちのようなものの眼差しに隠された恐怖に震えながら、お前は俺の刃が与える痛みに鳴く家畜のように鳴き声を上げるだろう」

languages.text: «Ese es el error de los mon-keigh. Chilláis como el ganado ante el dolor de nuestras hojas, cuando deberíais estremeceros ante los horrores que encierran las miradas de vuestros congéneres».
languages.original_text: "That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the gaze of those such as you."

traits.locale_text: «Ese es el error de los mon-keigh. Chilláis como el ganado ante el dolor de nuestras hojas, cuando deberíais estremeceros ante los horrores que encierran las miradas de vuestros congéneres».

languages.original_text: "That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the gaze of those such as you."

languages.text: "Mon-keighlerin aptallığı da bu işte. Kendi türünüzün bakışlarında gizlenen dehşetlerden tir tir titreyeceğiniz yerde kılıçlarımızın verdiği acıyla kasaplık hayvan gibi ciyaklıyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: "That is the folly of the mon-keigh. You squeal like livestock from the pain inflicted by our blades, when you ought to tremble at the horrors hidden in the gaze of those such as you."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighlerin aptallığı da bu işte. Kendi türünüzün bakışlarında gizlenen dehşetlerden tir tir titreyeceğiniz yerde kılıçlarımızın verdiği acıyla kasaplık hayvan gibi ciyaklıyorsunuz."
